title: Blind Pick is so annoying >.<
body:
Why can't people realise they won't always get the roles they want, and adapt to new ones?

For instance, I just joined a game where i called adc first, and someone else called adc after me. I waited a bit to make sure they werent gonna adc,  and if they were I was to change my role for the sake of the team. But they didn't say anything so I let them know im going adc and I locked in. After I locked in, he flamed and locked in ashe. anyways, no biggie cuz i dodged but it's so annoying ugh t.t

replies.body: I dont evne care what role i get in blind pick. I just pick whatever and make it work. Its blind pick normals, after all. My main gripe with Blind pick is people literally ff at 20 every game. I mean even in losing Blind pick games I'm trying to screw around and do something, but nah lets ff at 20 immediately. Sucks on the winning side, too.
There once was a queue called teambuilder.  Those were the days.

You mispelled "League of immaturity" : ^)


Happens in draft also
